story_teamflare_02_13000/2401_1001_0100_: Wait! We won’t let you leave like that!
story_teamflare_02_13000/2401_1001_0200_: We can’t face the boss if we leave empty-handed!
story_teamflare_02_13000/2401_1001_0300_:
We’ve got nothing to lose! Give us your
Legendary Pokémon!
story_teamflare_02_13000/2401_1001_0600_:
You seriously thought you could hurt our boss
with that?
story_teamflare_02_13000/2401_1001_0800_:
We’ve taken care of the other spies. Now you’re
the last two...
story_teamflare_02_13000/2401_1001_1000_:
Those who go against Team Flare will be
punished accordingly.
story_teamflare_02_13000/2401_1001_1100_: What are you going to do...?
